mapper.update: update pm_goods set stock=stock+#{number} where id=#{goodId}
mapper.select:
select pg.id, pg.`name` from pm_goods_virtual_stock pgvs left join pm_goods pg on pg.id = pgvs.goods_id where pgvs.store_id = #{storeId} and pgvs.del_flag = 0 and pg.del_flag = 0
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT id FROM pm_goods_rel_stock_template pgrst WHERE pgrst.`goods_id` = pg.`id` AND pgrst.`del_flag` = 0 AND pgrst.stock_template_id = #{id} )
order by pgvs.create_time desc

select pg.id, pg.`name` from pm_goods pg where pg.store_id = #{storeId} and pg.del_flag = 0
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT id FROM pm_goods_rel_stock_template pgrst WHERE pgrst.`goods_id` = pg.`id` AND pgrst.`del_flag` = 0 AND pgrst.stock_template_id = #{id} )
order by pg.create_time desc

SELECT pg.store_id, pg.id AS goodsId, pg.`name` AS goodsName, MIN(pgs.sell_price) AS sellPrice, MIN(pgs.line_price) AS linePrice, SUM(pgs.`sales_volume`) AS salesVolume, pg.icon FROM mm_information_rel_goods mirg LEFT JOIN pm_goods pg ON mirg.`goods_id` = pg.`id` AND mirg.`information_id` = #{id} AND mirg.`del_flag` = 0 LEFT JOIN pm_goods_sku pgs ON pgs.goods_id = pg.id
mi.id = #{id} AND pg.verify_status = 3 AND pg.del_flag = 0 AND pgs.del_flag = 0
GROUP BY pg.id ORDER BY pg.update_time DESC
